title: Browser Issues (Chrome/Edge/Firefox)
description: Fix browser problems including slow loading, crashes, and website issues.

steps.title: Clear Browser Cache and Cookies
steps.instruction: Chrome/Edge: Press Ctrl+Shift+Delete → Select 'All time' → Check 'Cookies' and 'Cached images' → Clear data. This fixes most loading issues.

steps.title: Disable Extensions
steps.instruction: Chrome: Three dots → Extensions → Manage Extensions → Toggle off extensions one by one to find problematic ones.

steps.title: Update Browser
steps.instruction: Chrome/Edge: Three dots → Help → About → Browser will auto-update. Restart browser after update.

steps.title: Reset Browser Settings
steps.instruction: Chrome/Edge: Settings → Reset settings → Restore settings to original defaults. This removes custom settings but keeps bookmarks.

steps.title: Try Incognito/Private Mode
steps.instruction: Press Ctrl+Shift+N (Chrome/Edge) or Ctrl+Shift+P (Firefox). If site works in incognito, the issue is likely an extension or cache.
